calls parse and stringify for CITEXT

calls parse and stringify for TSVECTOR
should return Int4 range properly #5747
should allow date ranges to be generated with default bounds inclusion #8176

should correctly return ranges when using predicates that define bounds inclusion #8176
calls parse and bindParam for GEOMETRY
should store and parse IEEE floating point literals \(NaN and Infinity\)
